name: websocket-client-simulator
description: Client simulator for WebSocket benchmarking - generates phased concurrent load and measures client-side metrics

scripts.test:ws: node src/benchmark.js --mode init --server ws://localhost:8080 --name ws --client-type ws
scripts.test:socketio: node src/benchmark.js --mode init --server http://localhost:3000 --name socketio --client-type socketio
scripts.test:go_gorilla: node src/benchmark.js --mode init --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gorilla --client-type ws
scripts.test:go_coder: node src/benchmark.js --mode init --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-coder --client-type ws
scripts.test:go_gobwas: node src/benchmark.js --mode init --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gobwas --client-type ws
scripts.test:go_fasthttp: node src/benchmark.js --mode init --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-fasthttp --client-type ws
scripts.test:load:ws: node src/benchmark.js --mode load --server ws://localhost:8080 --name ws --client-type ws
scripts.test:load:socketio: node src/benchmark.js --mode load --server http://localhost:3000 --name socketio --client-type socketio
scripts.test:load:go_gorilla: node src/benchmark.js --mode load --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gorilla --client-type ws
scripts.test:load:go_coder: node src/benchmark.js --mode load --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-coder --client-type ws
scripts.test:load:go_gobwas: node src/benchmark.js --mode load --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gobwas --client-type ws
scripts.test:load:go_fasthttp: node src/benchmark.js --mode load --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-fasthttp --client-type ws
scripts.test:broadcast:ws: node src/benchmark.js --mode broadcast --server ws://localhost:8080 --name ws --client-type ws
scripts.test:broadcast:socketio: node src/benchmark.js --mode broadcast --server http://localhost:3000 --name socketio --client-type socketio
scripts.test:broadcast:go_gorilla: node src/benchmark.js --mode broadcast --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gorilla --client-type ws
scripts.test:broadcast:go_coder: node src/benchmark.js --mode broadcast --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-coder --client-type ws
scripts.test:broadcast:go_gobwas: node src/benchmark.js --mode broadcast --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gobwas --client-type ws
scripts.test:broadcast:go_fasthttp: node src/benchmark.js --mode broadcast --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-fasthttp --client-type ws
scripts.test:stress:ws: node src/benchmark.js --mode stress --server ws://localhost:8080 --name ws --client-type ws
scripts.test:stress:socketio: node src/benchmark.js --mode stress --server http://localhost:3000 --name socketio --client-type socketio
scripts.test:stress:go_gorilla: node src/benchmark.js --mode stress --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gorilla --client-type ws
scripts.test:stress:go_coder: node src/benchmark.js --mode stress --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-coder --client-type ws
scripts.test:stress:go_gobwas: node src/benchmark.js --mode stress --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-gobwas --client-type ws
scripts.test:stress:go_fasthttp: node src/benchmark.js --mode stress --server ws://localhost:8080 --name golang-fasthttp --client-type ws
